metadata.name: Heavy Shoulders  1/25
metadata.description:
"Heavy Shoulders" was the first song I ever released. I'm learning, as an artist, it's crucial for reflection and revelation on the work that's been done and to see the journey and where I am today. When we share, we reveal, and can ultimately heal; we can become more ourselves which is...everything. So, I wanted to share my music through the written word in story form. 

This was recorded in 2022 at the Spotify Studios in Los Angeles, CA and is the first of 5 (my first EP released in 2016 that was comprised of 5 songs). This audio recording tells the story around the making of this song and where I was emotionally when I wrote it. I hope you find yourself reflected, seen and comforted by any or all of these words. 

If you haven't listened to this EP yet, you can stream it on all music platforms, under "TRACE." Thanks for being here. xx
